settings.title: Mission:
settings.text: To inspire the celebration of life with family and friends through the beauty of handcrafted Italian designs for the table, home, and garden. We believe in cherishing those moments that bring joy to our lives.

settings.title: Live.It TODAY
settings.text: We are choosing to focus on today. We want to live.it TODAY - not looking too far into the past or the future, but enjoying today for what it brings and what we can give to others, how we create memories around moments of joy and happiness. - Susan Gravely, Founder & CEO

Call the Outlet Store during regular business hours to learn more.

settings.heading: Announce your promotion
settings.textarea: Include the smaller details of your promotion in text below the title.

settings.heading: Under the Tuscan Sun
settings.text: Thoughtfully curated to transport you to the Tuscan countryside, our Frances Mayes Gift Guide pays tribute to the world-renowned author of Under the Tuscan Sun and her husband, Ed Mayes. Partnering with Frances and Ed we have created unique gift sets for all occasions combining our handcrafted ceramics with their nutty Bramasole Olive Oil, beautifully gaining its namesake from their Bramasole Villa in Cortona, Italy.
Shop Frances Mayes' Bramasole Olive Oil
settings.label: Shop now

settings.heading: ARES FLATWARE
settings.textarea: The perfect balance and weight for a luxury Flatware Experience.

settings.text: Lightweight yet sturdy with a glossy finish, our melamine collections are ideal for children and outdoor use. Made of 100% melamine in Philippines and BPA free.

settings.heading: Make entertaining easy and effortless with sets.
settings.text: We’ve taken the guesswork out of hosting by creating thoughtfully curated sets that join together some of our bestselling pieces, making shopping the least of your worries.

We encourage you to Shop Local and strengthen your community by supporting our retailers who have early access to our spring collections.

settings.textarea:
Something Navy is an influential lifestyle brand, infusing fashion-forward basics with a fun and approachable flair. Since its inception, Something Navy has defined elevated, everyday luxury for real women who crave something aspirational, something unexpected, something made for real life.

Founded by Arielle Charnas in 2009, Something Navy has evolved from a trusted style resource and content destination, to a media and lifestyle brand that offers wardrobe staples, on-trend accessories, and beauty, home and travel treasures. Much like its content, every part of the Something Navy collection is thoughtfully designed to open doors, start conversations, and inspire confidence, ensuring that all women feel seen and celebrated.

settings.heading: Celebrate summer with shatterproof style.
settings.textarea: Welcome the outdoor entertaining season with fresh, lightweight, incredibly durable melamine dinnerware.

settings.text: Something Navy is an influential lifestyle brand, infusing fashion-forward basics with a fun and approachable flair. Since its inception, Something Navy has defined elevated, everyday luxury for real women who crave something aspirational, something unexpected, something made for real life.  Founded by Arielle Charnas in 2009, Something Navy has evolved from a trusted style resource and content destination, to a media and lifestyle brand that offers wardrobe staples, on-trend accessories, and beauty, home, and travel treasures. Much like its content, every part of the Something Navy collection is thoughtfully designed to open doors, start conversations, and inspire confidence, ensuring that all women feel seen and celebrated.

settings.heading: SHOP LOCAL AND STRENGTHEN YOUR COMMUNITY
settings.textarea: Take a moment and become inspired as you shop our curated collections thoughtfully selected for our partnership with Garden & Gun. Plus, new spring favorites added just in time for the change of season. We encourage you to Shop Local and strengthen your community by supporting our retailers who have early access to our spring collections.

settings.text: <small>Eddie Ross is the Co-Founder and Chief Content Creator of Maximalist Studios, a place to create, connect, and celebrate. He has worked as a design, decorating, and food editor for Better Homes & Gardens, Food Network, Martha Stewart Living, and House Beautiful. Recognized by design aficionados for his inventive, out-of-the-box approach to decorating and entertaining, Eddie reimagines the aesthetic possibilities in secondhand finds, imbuing them with a chic and colorful sophistication within everyone’s reach. His design work has been published in Domino, Vanity Fair, Country Living, and the New York Times and his book entitled Modern Mix: Curating Personal Style with Chic & Accessible Finds was published by Gibbs Smith in September 2015.</small>

settings.heading: SHOP LOCAL AND STRENGTHEN YOUR COMMUNITY

settings.title: Live it
settings.subheading: To inspire the celebration of life with family and friends through the beauty of handcrafted Italian designs for the table, home, and garden. We believe in cherishing those moments that bring joy to our lives.

settings.title: Handcrafted, authentic, and made with love in Italy.

settings.text: The trio named their company VIETRI, a tribute to the town where it all began and play on the phrase "tre vite," Italian for "three lives."

settings.subtitle: Our story
settings.title: is a love affair...
settings.text: When Susan, Frances, and their mother, Lee Gravely, took their first trip to Italy in 1983, they fell in love with the Italian culture. During their stay at the San Pietro Hotel in Positano, they went to lunch and found themselves captivated by the hotel's colorful, handcrafted dinnerware. The next day they arranged to meet the artisans at a nearby factory in the town of Vietri sul Mare. As they watched the artisans paint, glaze, and fire each piece by hand, they were inspired to share the treasure they had discovered. The Gravelys returned home with an array of pieces with mixed patterns all related to nature. The collection would become known as Campagna, VIETRI's flagship dinnerware.

settings.title: We find joy around the table
settings.text:
Throughout the years, VIETRI's focus has been to celebrate the simple act of sharing a meal with family and friends. Inspired by the Italian lifestyle, VIETRI encourages savoring one another's company, and keeping sacred the time spent around the table.

GATHER WITH US

settings.title: Curate your collection
settings.text: We create beautiful products aimed to inspire you to enjoy time spent around the table celebrating life’s everyday moments with family and friends. Luxurious glazes, textures, and handpainted details elevate your home, whether having a quiet dinner or entertaining guests. Curate your collection with pieces you love most, while mixing and matching your favorites to create your own personal style. Our products are made to last with durable clays and high-quality glazes. The majority of our collections are dishwasher and microwave safe, so they're convenient for everyday use.

settings.subtitle: 2021 catalog
settings.title: irresistibly italian
settings.text: Shop our catalog

settings.title: Every piece we make is inspired by Italy
Since the beginning
settings.text: Italian artisans have handcrafted VIETRI collections with the highest-quality clays and glazes from the soil of the Italian countryside. As we expand and create new products for the table, home, and garden, we are continually inspired by the beauty of Italy - the countryside and the cities, the culture and lifestyle, the history and traditions. We hope that each product we create brings a special taste of Italy to your home.

settings.title: Our designs honor Italian craftsmanship
settings.subheading: VIETRI artisans follow ancient practices - using simple materials to create forms that pulse with life. Rooted in this tradition, we use modern techniques to create new designs and products.

settings.text:
VIETRI Warehouse Sale

Fall Warehouse Sale October 21-23, 2022.

Shop on vietrioutlet.com or in person at our Outlet in Hillsborough, NC.Receive an additional 50% off the lowest price on discontinued, slightly flawed, and one-of-a-kind Italian handcrafted dinnerware, glassware, flatware, home décor, and more! Limited quantities available. While supplies last.

Offer valid only on vietrioutlet.com orders or VIETRI Outlet in-store purchases. Offer cannot be applied to previous purchases. Offer applies to authorized purchases and cannot be combined with any other offer, one time per customer, and will not be accepted at a VIETRI retailer or on VIETRI.com. Savings will be automatically added to cart. Allow 8 to 12 business days for order processing prior to shipment during sale. Limited quantities available. Product availability may differ between online and in-store. Availability subject to prior purchase. All prices are final. Discounts may differ daily. Pricing will not be retroacted when a new discount is announced. Inventory is limited. We recommend shopping early for the best selection. VIETRI reserves the right to cancel any order due to unauthorized, altered, or ineligible use of offer or to modify or cancel this promotion due to system error or unforeseen problems. ALL SALES FINAL. Offer expires 10/23/22 at 11:59PM EST.

SIGN UP HERE FOR THE LATEST VIETRI OUTLET & WAREHOUSE SALE NEWS & OFFERS

--

WAREHOUSE SALE FAQ

When is the Warehouse Sale?

The Fall Warehouse Sale is October 21-23, 2022. The Warehouse Sale goes live on www.vietrioutlet.com and in-store at 9:00AM EST on October 21, 2022.

What time does the Warehouse Sale start?

The Warehouse Sale goes live on www.vietrioutlet.com and in-store at 9:00AM EST on October 21, 2022. The physical Outlet opens at 9:00AM EST on October 21, 2022.

Is local pickup available?

No, local pickup is not available during the Warehouse Sale.

What types of items are included in the Warehouse Sale?

The Warehouse Sale is a mix of retired, first-quality items, one-of-a-kind samples, and seconds. Chipped and flawed items will not be included in the sale.

What are the Outlet Store hours after the Warehouse Sale?

The Outlet Store will be closed October 17-20 and October 24-29 for sale prep, after sale inventory, and outlet reset. We reopen with regular hours at 1:00PM October 30.

What are the hours for the Outlet Store during the Warehouse Sale?

October 21-23, 9:00AM-5:00PM

Will there be more shopping available in the Warehouse?

Yes, during the Warehouse Sale the physical Outlet Store will expand into the warehouse. We will add more product to the Outlet Store during the Warehouse Sale.

What payment is accepted at the Outlet Store?

Card only. No cash/check.

Do you ship from the Outlet Store?

Shipping of purchases from the Outlet Store is not available during our Warehouse Sale.

Can you earn points on purchases during the Warehouse Sale?

No, points are not eligible to be earned during the Warehouse Sale.

Fall Warehouse Sale
October 21-23, 2022.

settings.subtitle: It’s smooth and simple
settings.title: Shop now, pay later with Klarna!
settings.text: It’s smooth and simple. Select Klarna at checkout to buy now and pay later. Spread the cost of your purchase over time with convenient, stress-free payment options. It is easy, safe to use, and you’re always covered by Klarna’s Buyer Protection.

What is Klarna?

Klarna is a global payments provider that works with retailers to give customers the smoothest online shopping experience by providing unique payment options and superior customer experience. Klarna has 2,500 employees around the world and is leading the way for alternative payments by serving 70 million consumers and 170,000 merchants. Learn more.

How do I pay in 4 interest-free installments?

Select 4 interest-free installments to split your purchase into equal payments, charged automatically every two weeks beginning at the time your order is confirmed (usually the shipment date). No bills are sent - you can simply sit back, relax, and enjoy your purchase. View complete terms.

Is there a fee to pay later in 30 days or in 4 interest-free installments?

There are no upfront fees or interest when you pay in 30 days or in installments through Klarna.

What is monthly financing through Klarna?

Monthly financing is available when you choose to open an account with Klarna at the time of checkout. This affordable and highly flexible open-end line of credit is issued by WebBank in partnership with Klarna, and it allows you to pay for your purchases over time and can be used anywhere in the Klarna merchant network. View complete terms.

Will this affect my credit score?

When you choose to Pay later in 30 days or in 4 interest-free installments, Klarna may perform a soft credit check. This type of credit check will not impact your credit score.

Monthly financing applications will take credit score and credit history into consideration when determining if the application is approved.

How can I reach Klarna?

You can reach Klarna anytime at https://www.klarna.com/us/customer-service/  

View all FAQs

settings.subtitle: VIETRI Retail Partners
settings.title: SHOP LOCAL
settings.text: VIETRI works with family-owned and operated factories throughout Italy to create handcrafted and authentic pieces that are sold in over 1,200 top specialty stores in all 50 states of the US, plus Canada, England, Mexico, South America, Asia, and Australia. Use our store locator to find a specialty location nearest to you.

Below, enjoy highlights from some of our most beloved retailers. These VIETRI partners go above and beyond for their customers, creating a one-of-a-kind in-store experience by evolving with the ever-changing digital age while staying true their brick-and-mortar business.

settings.subtitle: November Highlight
settings.title: Waiting on Martha Home
settings.text: Owned and operated by Mandy Kellogg Rye, this charming store, located in Atlanta, Georgia, is a true retail work of art. This season, she's outdoing herself once again for the holiday season.

settings.subtitle: October Highlight
settings.title: Protocol
settings.text: Protocol, located in Wilmington, NC, opened in 2002 and became a VIETRI partner shortly thereafter in 2005. Owner, John Jordan, has continually built the VIETRI brand in his beautiful store earning it the honor of being one of VIETRI's VIP Best.

settings.subtitle: February Highlight
settings.title: Allison Glen
settings.text: Allison Glen in Wexford, PA has been a wonderful partner to VIETRI since 2012. In just six short years, owners Barbara and Tim Hollihan have earned the highest level of VIP award that VIETRI has to offer - Villa VIETRI VIP.

settings.subtitle: January Highlight
settings.title: Waiting on Martha Home
settings.text: Owned and operated by Mandy Kellogg Rye, this charming store, located in Atlanta, Georgia, is a true retail work of art. As one of VIETRI’s fastest growing specialty stores, Waiting on Martha Home has become a VIP Gold status store for 2020.

settings.title: MEET ME IN THE PIAZZA
settings.text: A thoughtful tribute to daily life celebrating small moments, big picture ideas, behind-the-scenes sneak peeks, and the many undiscovered corners of Italy. Characterized as the meeting point for history, art, and lifestyle, la piazza exhibits the true identity of Italian culture.

settings.title: IL RITROVO
settings.text: Il Ritrovo, the rendezvous. An opportunity to delight in all things Italian – culture, art, history, experiences, travels, inspirations, and the beauty of everyday life.

settings.title: IL RITROVO WITH ELISABETTA & FRANCESCO MAZZEI

settings.code:
WE HAD NEVER SEEN ANYTHING SO BEAUTIFUL.

"I remember my first time driving through the hills from Naples toward Positano with Momma and Frances, and the breathtaking clearing in the trees as we approached a small winding road overlooking the Mediterranean Sea. We all agreed we must have died and gone to heaven because we had never seen anything so beautiful."

Susan Gravely, Founder

settings.title: Preorders
settings.text: Preorders will be purchased with inventory in the cart, but will not ship immediately. Payment will be collected at the time of checkout and you will be notified via email when your purchase has shipped. View estimated arrival times, by item, on their product pages or contact Customer Service for estimates. Given the handcrafted nature of our products, some items may take longer to arrive.

settings.title: Backorders
settings.text: Due to the global pandemic, unforeseen circumstances are causing international production and shipping delays for many brands including VIETRI. While we are working diligently to keep our product offerings in stock, you may notice an increase in backordered items on our website at this time. We recommend preordering your items when possible, allowing us to provide you with an estimated delivery timeline for your order. Please note extended delivery times are to be expected.

settings.title: Will my order be delayed due to Covid-19?
settings.text:
As a result of Covid-19, some items may be delayed due to global production and shipping challenges. 


At checkout, you will be provided with an estimated delivery range for your order based on your shipping method. Delivery updates and/or delays will be communicated via email. Our carriers are currently maintaining standard delivery operations except where limited by government restrictions.


We appreciate your patience and your love of VIETRI.

settings.title: Shipping Methods & Costs
settings.text:
VIETRI offers standard delivery. Standard delivery is estimated to arrive within 7-10 days depending on your location. Most VIETRI.com orders are processed and shipped within five days. VIETRI does not ship on Saturday or Sunday.

Unfortunately, at this time we do not offer international shipping, Saturday/holiday delivery, delivery to a PO Box, military post office, or freight forwarding company as well as shipping to Alaska, Hawaii, or Puerto Rico.

settings.title: When Will My Order Ship?
settings.text: Most VIETRI.com orders are processed and shipped within five days. VIETRI does not ship or process orders on Saturday or Sunday.

settings.title: Do You Offer Free Shipping?
settings.text: Yes, we offer free shipping on all orders over $99 that are shipping to the lower 48 states.

settings.title: Refusal of Delivery
settings.text: Refusals are not an acceptable way of return. If a shipment is refused and returned to VIETRI, we will issue a credit less shipping, both outgoing and incoming, as well as any applicable charges.

settings.title: What is the additional surcharge on my order?
settings.text: Due to the current environment, VIETRI has had direct price increases. To cover these increased expenses and to help maintain our commitment to world-class service, VIETRI is implementing a 3.5% service fee to all orders.

settings.title: What Is Your Return Policy?
settings.text:
VIETRI is committed to providing our customers with quality products and exceptional customer service. If within 30 days of receipt of your order, you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, VIETRI will gladly accept the return of your unused, unwashed, and undamaged merchandise for a full refund less shipping and gift wrap charges. Unused, unwashed, and undamaged products can be exchanged or returned for a store credit for up to 90 days after receipt of order.


Please note: Items purchased from www.vietri.com cannot be returned to a VIETRI retailer, they must be returned directly to VIETRI. To return an item, visit our Returns Center to submit your return request for refund, exchange, or store credit.


For more information regarding Returns, please visit: https://www.vietri.com/pages/shipping-returns

settings.title: What If My Shipment Arrives Damaged?
settings.text: We take great care when packaging all of our handcrafted items and do everything we can to ensure that your package will arrive at your home safely. This often requires extra packing materials and a careful consideration of the number of items in each box, adding to the overall expense of shipping. If your package does arrive damaged, please notify us immediately and keep all of the original packing materials. Please contact Customer Service via email at customerservice@vietri.com, via live chat, or by phone at (919) 245-4180 Monday - Friday 8:00AM to 5:00PM EST to receive a return authorization shipping label.

settings.title: Contact Us
settings.text: Please contact VIETRI Customer Service via email at customerservice@vietri.com, via live chat, or by phone at (919) 245-4180 Monday - Friday 8:00AM to 5:00PM EST with any questions or concerns.

settings.title: Do You Gift Wrap?
settings.text: Yes. Gift Wrap is valid on VIETRI.com orders only. Not applicable for retail partners. Please note: Gift Boxing & Wrapping applies to entire order. If you would like your items individually wrapped, please contact Customer Service via chat, email us at customerservice@vietri.com, or phone at 919-245-4180.

settings.title: HOW DO I JOIN THE VIETRI REWARDS PROGRAM?
settings.text:
You will automatically be enrolled in the VIETRI Rewards Program when you create a VIETRI account or log in to an existing account. You do not need to sign up separately to join VIETRI Rewards.

Create an account on www.vietri.com to become a Member. Membership is free. Visit https://www.vietri.com/pages/vietri-rewards for more information.

We recommend that you opt-in to our emails and SMS to ensure you receive updates about your VIETRI Rewards account and receive exclusive promotions.

settings.title: HOW DO I EARN VIETRI REWARDS POINTS?
settings.text:
There are several ways to earn Rewards Points, including but not limited to:  

- Sign Up Bonus - Create an account and earn 50 points.

- Learn about VIETRI - Earn 25 points by reading our blog. 

- Make a Purchase - Earn 1 point for every dollar spent on an order. 

- Write a Review - Earn 25 points by writing reviews for the products you ordered.

- Follow on Instagram - Follow our Instagram page and earn 25 points.

- Birthday Bonus - Add your birthday to your account and earn 100 points.

- Preorder Products - Earn 2 points for every dollar spent on all preorder items.

And more! For a complete list of ways to earn Rewards Points - click here.

settings.title: CAN I RECEIVE POINTS FOR PURCHASES MADE PRIOR TO JOINING THE REWARDS PROGRAM?
settings.text: No, only purchases made after joining the Rewards Program are eligible to receive points and count towards your total tier spend.

settings.title: WHAT REWARDS CAN I EARN?
settings.text:
For every 100 VIETRI Rewards Points you earn, you’re eligible for a $5 credit. Redeemable amounts are illustrated below:

100 points = $5
200 points = $10
400 points = $20
800 points = $40
2,000 points = $100

To add credit to your account, log in to your account, click View My Points and Rewards, and convert your points into credit.

settings.title: WILL I EARN VIETRI REWARDS POINTS ON ALL MY PURCHASES?
settings.text:
All orders are eligible to earn points. VIETRI Rewards Points will not be issued for any shipping costs.

If you’re using a promo code with your order, the VIETRI Rewards Points you earn will be based on your final order value once the promo code has been applied.

settings.title: WHEN WILL MY POINTS BE AWARDED TO MY ACCOUNT?
settings.text: For purchases made on VIETRI.com, points will be awarded to your loyalty account within 30 minutes of your transaction.

settings.title: HOW DO I REDEEM MY POINTS FOR A REWARD?
settings.text: When shopping on VIETRI.com, Points can be redeemed towards a Rewards coupon at checkout. You must be logged in to your account using your VIETRI Rewards email address to redeem points for a Reward at checkout. Also, to receive free economy shipping and/or to apply any loyalty member-specific promotions, you must be logged into your account when beginning checkout.

settings.title: HOW DO I FIND OUT HOW MANY REWARDS POINTS I HAVE?
settings.text: Log in using your VIETRI Rewards email here. On your account page you will see how many points you have, what status tier you are in, how much you need to spend to reach the next tier, as well as a complete history of your points and purchase activity.

settings.title: WHY CAN'T I USE MY REWARDS DISCOUNT CODE AND A PROMO CODE ON THE SAME PURCHASE?
settings.text: When shopping on VIETRI.com, a Rewards coupon code cannot be used in addition to another promo code or an additional Rewards coupon code. Codes do not stack.

settings.title: I RETURNED MY PURCHASE THAT WAS MADE USING A REWARDS COUPON, WILL I GET MY POINTS BACK?
settings.text: When returning all or part of a purchase made on VIETRI.com, any Points you redeemed on that purchase will be credited back to your account.

settings.title: I FORGOT TO ADD MY REWARD AT CHECKOUT. CAN I ADD IT AFTER I’VE ORDERED?
settings.text: If you forgot to add your dollar-off code or gift reward at checkout, please contact us at customerservice@vietri.com or via live chat with your order number and reward details. We'll double-check your account and work to find the best solution for you.

settings.title: MY MEMBERSHIP TIER IS INCORRECT. HOW CAN I GET IT UPDATED?
settings.text: Your membership tier is based on your purchases in the past 12 months. If you believe you should be in a different tier, please contact us at customerservice@vietri.com or via live chat with the tier you think you should be in and we'll work to make things right.

settings.title: POINTS IN MY ACCOUNT HAVE GONE MISSING.
settings.text:
Any points earned from a purchase returned in its entirety will be removed from your account. If you’ve earned points on a purchase that is partially returned, your points will be reversed, and your total points earned on the purchase will reflect your original subtotal minus the total amount of the items returned.

If you think you have enough points for a reward but your account is not loading properly, please contact us at customerservice@vietri.com or via live chat. We'll check your account from our end and help you use your rewards on an order.

settings.title: I DIDN'T GET MY BIRTHDAY REWARD.
settings.text:
To receive your birthday reward, you must have visited the “My Rewards” section of your account on www.vietri.com and input your birthday month and day at least 30 days before your birthday.

To prevent abuse of this reward, if you input your birthdate a day after your birthday, you won't be granted your Birthday Reward until your birthday the following year. If you entered your birthdate less than 30 days prior to your birthday, your Reward will be granted in delay, up to 30 days. If you entered your birthdate any time prior to 30 days of your birthday, your Reward should have been granted normally on your birthday.

settings.title: HOW CAN I USE MORE THAN A $200 DISCOUNT REWARD?
settings.text: $200 is the max Rewards discount to be used per transaction. Only one discount can be used per order. To use additional Rewards, create a separate order and apply your Rewards.

settings.title: HOW LONG DOES IT TAKE FOR MY POINTS TO SHOW IN MY ACCOUNT FOR A REVIEW I SUBMITTED?
settings.text: Typically it takes 3-5 business days (if not sooner) for the review points to reflect in your account once submitted.  Reviews will need to be a week apart and will only allow up to 5 reviews for points. If 2x reviews are submitted in one week only 1 set of points will be rewarded. 5 max overall per customer.

settings.title: DO I EARN VIETRI REWARDS POINTS ON ORDERS FROM THIRD-PARTY SITES?
settings.text: VIETRI Rewards Points can only be earned through purchases made directly on www.vietri.com. Orders placed on Amazon, or any other partner site, will not earn you VIETRI Rewards Points.

settings.title: WHEN DO MY POINTS AND/OR TIER STATUS EXPIRE?
settings.text: Your eligibility to achieve Silver, Gold, and Platinum status tiers is based on your cumulative eligible purchases made online at www.vietri.com. Your tier status lasts for 12 months following your entry to the tier unless you continue to make additional purchases within those 12 months that meet the threshold of the next highest tier. Conversely, if you make a return that decreases your 12 month cumulative spend below your current tier's threshold, your tier status will be lowered. However, your points do not expire.

settings.title: IF I HAVE MULTIPLE EMAIL ADDRESSES/ACCOUNTS, CAN I COMBINE THE POINTS?
settings.text:
If you’ve made multiple purchases under different email addresses associated with the VIETRI Rewards Program, we can combine your points over to one email address.

Please note, we will only be able to combine them once, so be sure to take note of the email address you frequently use to make purchases! Reach out to our Customer Service team for further assistance.

settings.title: CAN I CHANGE THE EMAIL ASSOCIATED WITH MY VIETRI REWARDS ACCOUNT?
settings.text: Unfortunately, it is currently not possible to change the email address associated with your VIETRI Rewards account.

settings.title: HOW DO I REFER A FRIEND? WHAT IF I’M NOT SEEING MY REFERRAL POINTS?
settings.text:
If you'd like to refer a friend, you can log in and navigate to your account page. If you scroll down, there will be an area for you to "Refer A Friend". You will be able to send your friend an email, copy the referral link, or share via Facebook and Twitter. 

Once your friend places their order of $125 or more (pre-tax & pre-discount) with your referral code, you will receive a $20 off promo code via email. This happens as soon as your friend's order is confirmed.

If your friend has placed their order but you're still not seeing your $20 off promo code, please contact us at customerservice@vietri.com or via live chat with your friend's name and email address! We'll check on their order and make sure you get your points.

settings.title: Nature of Goods
settings.text: VIETRI products are handcrafted by skilled artisans using centuries-old techniques and classic Italian design. With those heritage-inspired ideals, VIETRI marries ever-evolving technology and an uncompromising commitment to quality. Each handcrafted product is an authentic and unique work of craftsmanship. As such, its nuances are to be expected and treasured.

settings.title: Earthenware, Italian Stoneware & Stoneware
settings.text:
VIETRI tableware and home and garden accessories are handcrafted and handpainted in a variety of Italian clays. For years of enjoyment, please treat all products with care.

All Italian stoneware and stoneware collections are dishwasher, microwave, freezer, and oven safe and highly resistant to chipping. All earthenware (terra cotta, terra bianca, and terra marrone) collections are dishwasher safe and most are microwave safe. Some may be placed in the freezer and oven if noted on piece.

We recommend using the low-energy/air-dry cycle and not overloading the dishwasher. Please use a mild, non-abrasive, non-fragrant/non-citrus dishwashing detergent. Handwashing is recommended for decorative and oversized accessories.

Over time, crazing - the formation of miniscule lines in the glaze - may occur on ceramics. This contributes to the unique visual quality of Italian clays and does not affect the durability or safety of the product. Since earthenware is porous, it expands and contracts with extreme heat and cold.

All dinnerware and serving accessories meet FDA and Prop 65 requirements, except when noted otherwise.

settings.title: Glassware
settings.text: VIETRI seeks durability, as well as artistry, in designing glassware, dinnerware, and decorative accessories. Not all glassware collections are dishwasher safe. Please reference product care details on vietrioutlet.com. To help prevent clouding of glass that is dishwasher safe, refrain from harsh detergents and use the low-energy/air-dry cycle of the dishwasher or wash by hand. Do not place glass in the freezer unless otherwise noted.

settings.title: Flatware
settings.text:
VIETRI flatware is made of the highest quality 18/10 stainless steel. The 18/10 combination is the highest quality alloy (metal mixture) available for making stainless steel flatware and includes 18% chrome for maximum corrosion resistance and 10% nickel for a silver-like luster.

Stainless steel is not stain proof. Ingredients found in tea, coffee, salad dressing, vinegar, and salt can cause discoloration. Pitting or spotting is usually caused by hard water or foods with high salt content.

VIETRI flatware is dishwasher safe, unless otherwise noted.

Use the low-energy/air-dry cycle with the handles placed up in the basket and a mild, non-abrasive/non-citrus detergent without chlorine, alcohol, or perfumes. Knives should be placed in a separate basket.

If cleaning by hand, use a plastic or stainless pan (never aluminum), dish soap, and warm water.

Whether you clean your flatware by hand or in a dishwasher, dry it thoroughly, right away. Air drying will often leave spots and streaks.

In hard water areas, use a water-softening agent to avoid spotting or pitting.

Don’t allow food to stay on the flatware for long periods of time. Flatware should not be allowed to sit in water for days.

settings.title: Accessories
settings.text:
VIETRI ceramic accessories make strikingly attractive containers for plants and flowers. For these pieces, we recommend using a liner underneath them to protect surfaces from moisture and scratches as well as not placing liquid in these pieces for an extended period of time.

Planters and cachepots should be brought inside during winter months as freezing water or freezing temperatures may cause cracks.

settings.title: Linens
settings.text: VIETRI linens are made of linen, cotton, and vinyl. Please see linen tags for specific makeup. Papersoft Napkins are made of a fibrous material (spunlace). Bianco is biodegradable.

settings.title: HOW DO I REFER A FRIEND? WHAT IF I’M NOT SEEING MY REFERRAL POINTS?
settings.text:
If you'd like to refer a friend, you can log in and navigate to your account page. If you scroll down, there will be an area for you to "Refer A Friend". You will be able to send your friend an email, copy the referral link, or share via Facebook and Twitter. 

Once your friend places their order of $125 or more (pre-tax & pre-discount) with your referral code, you will receive a $20 off promo code via email. This happens as soon as your friend's order is confirmed.

If your friend has placed their order but you're still not seeing your $20 off promo code, please contact us at customerservice@vietri.com or via live chat with your friend's name and email address! We'll check on their order and make sure you get your points.
